translated: smoke arises, it is present. This is the dependence on place.

original: stsogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gnas skabs kyi khyad @19b par bsdus te /
analyzed: stsogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gnas skabs kyi khyad @19b par bsdus te /
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the dependence on a particular state.

original: me nye ba'i du ba ni gnas skabs kyi khyad par gang zhig mthong ba de la ltos te /
analyzed: me nye ba'i du ba ni gnas skabs kyi khyad par gang zhig mthong ba de la ltos te /
translated: The smoke near the fire is seen to have a particular state.

original: yang da ltar gyi dus su grang ba med par rjes su dpog bar byed do //
analyzed: yang da ltar gyi dus su grang ba med par rjes su dpog bar byed do //
translated: Depending on that, one infers that cold is absent at the present time.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'di na me yod de du ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la yang yul dang dus la sogs pa la ltos pa 'di kho na bsdu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'di na me yod de du ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la yang yul dang dus la sogs pa la ltos pa 'di kho na bsdu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is for the purpose of including the case of a reason based on effect, as in ‚ÄúHere there is fire because there is smoke.‚Äù

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni gal te yul dang dus la sogs pa la ltos pa ma yin na de'i tshe 'gal ba'i 'bras bu 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni gal te yul dang dus la sogs pa la ltos pa ma yin na de'i tshe 'gal ba'i 'bras bu 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means that if it did not depend on place, time, etc., then the effect would be contradictory and mistaken.

original: ci dang 'dra zhe na mi grang ba bsgrub pa la ni thal ba bzhin /
analyzed: ci dang 'dra zhe na mi grang ba bsgrub pa la ni thal ba bzhin /
translated: What is it like? It is like smoke in the proof of fire.

original: dper na mi grang ba bsgrub pa la ste grang ba med par bsgrub par bya ba la yul dang dus la sogs pa la mi ltos pa'i thal ba 'khrul pa yin pa de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: dper na mi grang ba bsgrub pa la ste grang ba med par bsgrub par bya ba la yul dang dus la sogs pa la mi ltos pa'i thal ba 'khrul pa yin pa de dang 'dra'o //
translated: For example, in the proof of fire, smoke is not mistaken.

original: gzhan gyis 'o na rgyu tshogs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis 'o na rgyu tshogs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Another says: ‚ÄúWell then, the collection of causes, etc.‚Äù

original: tshogs pas zhes bya ba ni nye ba ma nyams pas so //
analyzed: tshogs pas zhes bya ba ni nye ba ma nyams pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúCollection‚Äù means not deficient.

original: dper na rgyu spun gyis gnas skabs kyi skud pa byed pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bus zin pa dag mthong nas 'bras bu ras yug 'byung bar rjes su dpog par byed pa lta bu'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs de ji ltar gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum po
analyzed: dper na rgyu spun gyis gnas skabs kyi skud pa byed pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bus zin pa dag mthong nas 'bras bu ras yug 'byung bar rjes su dpog par byed pa lta bu'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs de ji ltar gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum po
translated: How is this reason called cause included in the three types of reasons

original: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang rang mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i nang du 'du /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang rang mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i nang du 'du /
translated: called nature, effect, and non-observation?

original: re zhig mi dmigs pa'i nang du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig mi dmigs pa'i nang du ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not included in non-observation,

original: yod pa bsgrub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa bsgrub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it proves existence.

original: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi nang du yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi nang du yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not included in the reason of effect,

original: rgyu'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of the cause.

original: rang bzhin gtan tshigs kyi nang du yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin gtan tshigs kyi nang du yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not included in the reason of nature,

original: rgyu don gzhan gyis 'bras bu don gzhan rjes su dpog pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu don gzhan gyis 'bras bu don gzhan rjes su dpog pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because the effect, which is a different object, is inferred from the cause, which is a different object.

original: nang du bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nang du bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the inclusion,üîΩhe says:

original: rgyu tshogs pas 'bras bu skye bar rjes su dpog ba gang yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rgyu tshogs pas 'bras bu skye bar rjes su dpog ba gang yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe collection of causes is inferred from the production of the effect‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di skad du de 'bras bu 'byung ba kho na rjes su dpog pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang rgyu tshogs pa rnams kyis 'bras bu skyed par rung ba nyid kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: 'di skad du de 'bras bu 'byung ba kho na rjes su dpog pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang rgyu tshogs pa rnams kyis 'bras bu skyed par rung ba nyid kyi khyad par ro //
translated: This is what is being said: the effect is not inferred just from its production, but rather from the special capacity of the collection of causes to generate the effect.

original: tshigs su bcad pa las 'bras bu skye zhes bya ba 'byung ba yang rgyu'i rung ba nyid kho na la bya ste /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa las 'bras bu skye zhes bya ba 'byung ba yang rgyu'i rung ba nyid kho na la bya ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúproduction‚Äù in the verse refers to the capacity of the cause.

original: 'di la 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: 'di la 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur bas so //
translated: Because the effect is produced from it.

original: de'i phyir de ni rang bzhin yin par brjod /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni rang bzhin yin par brjod /
translated: Therefore, it is called the essence.

original: rung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos de ni rgyu tshogs pa de'i rang bzhin yin par brjod do //
analyzed: rung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos de ni rgyu tshogs pa de'i rang bzhin yin par brjod do //
translated: That property which has the characteristic of capacity is called the essence of the collection of causes.

original: ci'i phyir rang bzhin yin par brjod ce na /üîΩdon gzhan la ni mi ltos @20a * //
analyzed: ci'i phyir rang bzhin yin par brjod ce na / don gzhan la ni mi ltos @20a * //
translated: Why is it called the essence?üîΩBecause it does not depend on another object.

original: phyir rgyu tshogs pa de ni rgyu gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir rgyu tshogs pa de ni rgyu gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The collection of causes does not depend on another cause.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'di yang zhes bya ba la sog pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'di yang zhes bya ba la sog pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says, ‚ÄúThis is also . . .‚Äù

original: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni rgyu tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni rgyu tshogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù refers to the assemblage of causes.

original: rgyu'i tshogs pa ni ltar nye ba las rgyu gzhan la mi ltos te /
analyzed: rgyu'i tshogs pa ni ltar nye ba las rgyu gzhan la mi ltos te /
translated: The assemblage of causes is not dependent on another cause, since it is close at hand.

original: gtan tshigs des na de'i de tsam dang 'brel pa ste ;
analyzed: gtan tshigs des na de'i de tsam dang 'brel pa ste ;
translated: For that reason, it is related to that mere cause,

original: / rgyu tshogs pa tsam dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin yin no / gang gi yin zhe na ngo bo'i ste rgyu tshogs pa'i yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: / rgyu tshogs pa tsam dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin yin no / gang gi yin zhe na ngo bo'i ste rgyu tshogs pa'i yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: that is, it is related to the mere assemblage of causes. Whose? The nature‚Äôs, that is, the assemblage of causes.

original: 'di ltar de la ni rgyu dag tshogs na rtags rgyu tshogs pa las 'bras bu 'byung bar srid pa rjes su dpog par byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar de la ni rgyu dag tshogs na rtags rgyu tshogs pa las 'bras bu 'byung bar srid pa rjes su dpog par byed do //
translated: Thus, when the causes are assembled, the sign infers the possibility of the effect‚Äôs arising from the assemblage of causes.

original: 'di las srid pas na srid pa ste /
analyzed: 'di las srid pas na srid pa ste /
translated: Since possibility exists from that, there is possibility.

original: 'bras bu skyed par rung ba nyid rjes su dpog bar byed de zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'bras bu skyed par rung ba nyid rjes su dpog bar byed de zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It infers the suitability of the effect‚Äôs arising. That is the meaning.

original: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir tshogs pa rnams kyis 'bras bu bskyed par rung ba nyid rjes su dpog pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir tshogs pa rnams kyis 'bras bu bskyed par rung ba nyid rjes su dpog pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: In order to clarify that, he says, ‚Äúbecause the capacity to generate an effect is inferred from the assemblage.‚Äù

original: rung ba nyid kyang tshogs pa tsam dang 'brel pa yin pas zhes bya ba ni rgyu gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rung ba nyid kyang tshogs pa tsam dang 'brel pa yin pas zhes bya ba ni rgyu gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because capacity is related to the mere assemblage, it does not depend on another cause.

original: de la 'dir tshogs pa 'bras bu ma bskyed ba rnams ni rung ba nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de la 'dir tshogs pa 'bras bu ma bskyed ba rnams ni rung ba nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: Here, the assemblage that has not yet generated an effect is what is to be established as having capacity.

original: tshogs pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni spyi'i gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: tshogs pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni spyi'i gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: The reason, ‚Äúbecause of being an assemblage,‚Äù is a general reason.

original: 'bras bu bskyed zin pa rnams ni dpe yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu bskyed zin pa rnams ni dpe yin no //
translated: The assemblage that has already generated an effect is the example.

original: sbyor ba ni rgyu zad par tshogs pa gang dang gang yin pa de dang de ni skad cig ma phyi ma phyi ma yongs su gyur pas 'bras bu bskyed par rung ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni rgyu zad par tshogs pa gang dang gang yin pa de dang de ni skad cig ma phyi ma phyi ma yongs su gyur pas 'bras bu bskyed par rung ba nyid yin te /
translated: The syllogism is: ‚ÄúThat which is an assemblage that has exhausted its cause is capable of generating an effect, because of being a subsequent transformation.

original: dper na rgyu tshogs pa 'bras bu bskyed zin pa dag lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na rgyu tshogs pa 'bras bu bskyed zin pa dag lta bu'o //
translated: For example, like an assemblage of causes that has already generated an effect.‚Äù

original: 'di yang rgyu zad par tshogs pa yin pas rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang rgyu zad par tshogs pa yin pas rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: This is also a collection of causes that have been exhausted, and so it is a natural reasoning.

original: gzhan gyis yang ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis yang ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: Another says, ‚ÄúWhy is it not inferred from the collection itself?‚Äù

original: tshogs pa las 'bras bu kho na ji ste rjes su dpog par mi byed /
analyzed: tshogs pa las 'bras bu kho na ji ste rjes su dpog par mi byed /
translated: Why is it that the effect is not inferred from the collection itself?

original: 'di la ni brtag pa gnyis yod de /üîΩnus pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu rjes su dpag gam byed rgyu'i rgyu las rjes su dpag / re zhig phyogs dang po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la ni brtag pa gnyis yod de / nus pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu rjes su dpag gam byed rgyu'i rgyu las rjes su dpag / re zhig phyogs dang po ni ma yin te /
translated: There are two alternatives here:üîΩIs the effect inferred from a cause that is an unobstructed potency, or is it inferred from an acting cause?

original: de la ni dus su sdod pa med pa'i phyir 'bras bu byung ba mngon sum kho nar 'gyur ro /
analyzed: de la ni dus su sdod pa med pa'i phyir 'bras bu byung ba mngon sum kho nar 'gyur ro /
translated: The first is not possible, because in that case the effect would be directly perceived to have arisen, since it would not be delayed until the time of the collection.

original: gnyis pa la yang 'khrul par bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩtshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i nus pa rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩde dag ni tshogs pa'i 'bras bu yang yin la nus pa yang yin pas /
analyzed: gnyis pa la yang 'khrul par bstan pa'i phyir / tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i nus pa rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / de dag ni tshogs pa'i 'bras bu yang yin la nus pa yang yin pas /
translated: The second is also taught to be mistaken:üîΩ‚ÄúThe potencies of the effects of the collection‚Äù and so on.

original: tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i nus pa rnams so //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i nus pa rnams so //
translated: They are the potencies of the effects of the collection.

original: 'di ltar tshogs pa @20b snga ma las phyi ma nus pa'i mtshan nyid skye la de'i bdag nyid phul du byung ba yang nus pa yin pas tshogs pa'i 'bras bu nus pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar tshogs pa @20b snga ma las phyi ma nus pa'i mtshan nyid skye la de'i bdag nyid phul du byung ba yang nus pa yin pas tshogs pa'i 'bras bu nus pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the subsequent state arises from the prior state, and the nature of that is the most excellent potency. Therefore, the effect of the assemblage is potency.

original: de rnams 'gyur ba ni phyi ma phyi ma rgyun gyis 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams 'gyur ba ni phyi ma phyi ma rgyun gyis 'byung ba ste /
translated: The transformation of those is the occurrence of the subsequent state through a continuum.

original: de dang 'brel cing de la ltos pa'i 'bras bu rgyus rjes su dpag par bya ba ni nges pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de dang 'brel cing de la ltos pa'i 'bras bu rgyus rjes su dpag par bya ba ni nges pa nyid yin no //
translated: The effect that is related to that and dependent on that is to be inferred from the cause.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gags byed pa dag srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gags byed pa dag srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the obstruction of that is possible.

original: de bstan pa'i phyir rgyu'i rdzas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir rgyu'i rdzas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says, ‚ÄúThe cause is the assemblage of conditions,‚Äù etc.

original: rgyu'i rdzas tshogs pa dag kho na ste /
analyzed: rgyu'i rdzas tshogs pa dag kho na ste /
translated: The cause is the assemblage of conditions.

original: nye ba dag kho na rang gi 'bras bu skyed par byed cing 'byin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nye ba dag kho na rang gi 'bras bu skyed par byed cing 'byin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The proximate cause alone generates its effect, but it does not produce it.

original: ci'i phyir skyed par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir skyed par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why does it not produce it?

original: tshogs pa las skye ba can gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: tshogs pa las skye ba can gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúThe effect that arises from the assemblage,‚Äù etc.

original: nus pa gang dag la tshogs pa las skye ba yod pa de dag gi 'gyur ba ni skad cig ma snga ma snga ma las skad cig ma phyi ma phyi ma khyad par du 'phags pa 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: nus pa gang dag la tshogs pa las skye ba yod pa de dag gi 'gyur ba ni skad cig ma snga ma snga ma las skad cig ma phyi ma phyi ma khyad par du 'phags pa 'byung ba ste /
translated: The transformation of those things that arise from a collection is the arising of a later moment that is superior to the earlier moment.

original: 'bras bu skye ba ne di la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu skye ba ne di la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the arising of the effect depends on this.

original: bar 'dir zhes bya ba ni rgyun 'gyur ba'i tshe gags byed pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bar 'dir zhes bya ba ni rgyun 'gyur ba'i tshe gags byed pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The interval is the time of the transformation of the continuum, because it is possible that something will obstruct it.

original: rung ba nyid kyang skad cig ma phyi ma phyi ma 'gyur ba la rag las pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rung ba nyid kyang skad cig ma phyi ma phyi ma 'gyur ba la rag las pa ma yin nam /
translated: But is not the suitability dependent on the transformation of the later moment?

original: de la yang gnod pa srid pa'i phyir ji ltar de rjes su dpag ce na /
analyzed: de la yang gnod pa srid pa'i phyir ji ltar de rjes su dpag ce na /
translated: How can that be inferred, since it is possible that it will be obstructed?

original: rung ba nyid ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //üîΩrdzas gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rung ba nyid ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // rdzas gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúSuitability is not dependent on another,‚Äù etc.üîΩBecause it does not depend on another substance.

original: rgyu'i tshogs pa nye ba la ma gtogs pa rgyu gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu'i tshogs pa nye ba la ma gtogs pa rgyu gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not depend on another cause, apart from the presence of the collection of causes.

original: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir nus pa phyi ma phyi ma 'gyur bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir nus pa phyi ma phyi ma 'gyur bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to clarify that, he says, ‚Äúbecause of the transformation of the subsequent potency,‚Äù and so on.

original: skad cig ma snga ma snga ma rgyur byas nas /
analyzed: skad cig ma snga ma snga ma rgyur byas nas /
translated: The subsequent moments arise from the prior moments as their cause.

original: nus pas skad cig ma phyi ma phyi ma skye ba ni nus pa phyi ma 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: nus pas skad cig ma phyi ma phyi ma skye ba ni nus pa phyi ma 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The transformation of the subsequent potency is the arising of the subsequent moments from the prior moments.

original: rnam pa des na rgyu tshogs pa 'di 'bras bu bskyed par nus pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa des na rgyu tshogs pa 'di 'bras bu bskyed par nus pa yin no //
translated: In this way, this collection of causes is able to produce the effect.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: nus pa 'gyur ba'i rkyen zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: nus pa 'gyur ba'i rkyen zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúbecause it does not depend on any other conditions for the transformation of the potency,‚Äù and so on.

original: nus pa 'gyur ba'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen gzhan gang yin pa de la ltos par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa 'gyur ba'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen gzhan gang yin pa de la ltos par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not depend on any other cooperative conditions for the transformation of the potency.

original: 'o na nus pa 'gyur ba ci zhig las skye zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na nus pa 'gyur ba ci zhig las skye zhe na /
translated: Well then, from what does the transformation of the potency arise?

original: rang gi rigs snga ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rang gi rigs snga ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúfrom its own prior type,‚Äù and so on.

original: rang gi rigs snga ma ni rgyu'i tshogs pa snga ma 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi rigs snga ma ni rgyu'i tshogs pa snga ma 'dra ba ste /
translated: Its own prior type is the prior collection of causes that is similar.

original: nus pa skye ba gang la rgyu de tsam yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: nus pa skye ba gang la rgyu de tsam yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That is called ‚Äúthe mere cause that exists for the arising of the potency.‚Äù

original: de'i ngo bo ni nyid de de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni nyid de de'i phyir ro //
translated: The nature of that is just that, therefore.

original: de'i phyir na rung ba nyid ni gzhan la mi ltos pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na rung ba nyid ni gzhan la mi ltos pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, suitability is said to be independence from another.

original: 'o na rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes @21a * //
analyzed: 'o na rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes @21a * //
translated: Now, the statement ‚Äúas cause and effect, etc.‚Äù

original: bya ba la sogs pas ni yang de ni rnam gsum nyid ces bya ba 'di 'gal bar ston te /
analyzed: bya ba la sogs pas ni yang de ni rnam gsum nyid ces bya ba 'di 'gal bar ston te /
translated: demonstrates the contradiction of this statement, ‚ÄúIt is just threefold.‚Äù

original: rgyu dang 'bras bur ma gyur pa /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bur ma gyur pa /
translated: That which is not a cause and effect

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i don las gzhan pa ro la sogs pas so //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i don las gzhan pa ro la sogs pas so //
translated: is other than the object to be inferred, such as taste, etc.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni dri la sogs pa ba sdu'o //
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni dri la sogs pa ba sdu'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes smell, etc.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa ste /
translated: It is the realization of form, etc.

original: 'dir yang sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rig pa la sogs pa bsdus te /
analyzed: 'dir yang sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rig pa la sogs pa bsdus te /
translated: Here also, the word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes cognition, etc.

original: mun khung nam du lung ga la sogs pa'i ro myangs pa dang / me tog tsam pa ka la sogs pa'i dri bsnams pa dang / me'i reg pa nyams su myong nas de dag gi gzugs spyi rjes su dpag par byed pa de bzhin du me'i gzugs mthong nas de'i reg pa yang rjes su dpog par byed na de ji ltar gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum gyi nang du 'du zhes bya bar skabsüîΩdang sbyar ro //
analyzed: mun khung nam du lung ga la sogs pa'i ro myangs pa dang / me tog tsam pa ka la sogs pa'i dri bsnams pa dang / me'i reg pa nyams su myong nas de dag gi gzugs spyi rjes su dpag par byed pa de bzhin du me'i gzugs mthong nas de'i reg pa yang rjes su dpog par byed na de ji ltar gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum gyi nang du 'du zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: How can this be included in the three types of logical reason?

original: 'bras bur gyur pa ma yin pas rjes su dpog pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi nang du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bur gyur pa ma yin pas rjes su dpog pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi nang du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not included in the logical reason of effect because it is not an effect.

original: rgyur gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi nang du yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyur gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi nang du yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not included in the logical reason of nature because it is not a nature.

original: rgyu las rjes su dpog na ni rung ba nyid rjes su dpog pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu las rjes su dpog na ni rung ba nyid rjes su dpog pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If one infers the cause, it would be a logical reason of nature because it would be an inference of a suitable object.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i don las gzhan pas rjes su dpog pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi nang du yang ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i don las gzhan pas rjes su dpog pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi nang du yang ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Nor is it a natural inference, because it infers a meaning other than the inferred meaning.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
translated: The proponent of tenets says:

original: de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: That also is a nonobservation of a pervader.

original: rtogs pa de yang zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa de yang zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: That realization also is a nonobservation of a pervader.

original: gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya bar khyad par ji lta bu can zhig ce na /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya bar khyad par ji lta bu can zhig ce na /
translated: What kind of distinction is there in the form and so on?

original: tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa ste /üîΩro skyed par byed pa'i tshogs pa gang yin pa'i tshogs pa de kho na la rag las brtags ros rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag pas te /
analyzed: tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa ste / ro skyed par byed pa'i tshogs pa gang yin pa'i tshogs pa de kho na la rag las brtags ros rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag pas te /
translated: It is dependent on a single collection.üîΩThe realization of taste is dependent on that very collection that generates taste.üîΩThat is the inference of the attribute of the cause.

original: ro'i rgyu nye bar len pa snga ma gang yin pa de'i chos gzugs bskyed par bya ba lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu thogs pa med pa nyid gang yin pa de rjes su dpag pas yin no //
analyzed: ro'i rgyu nye bar len pa snga ma gang yin pa de'i chos gzugs bskyed par bya ba lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu thogs pa med pa nyid gang yin pa de rjes su dpag pas yin no //
translated: The attribute of the former appropriated cause of taste is the unobstructed power to generate the form that is the object to be produced. That is the inference.

original: 'di skad du ro las dngos su gzugs rjes su dpog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di skad du ro las dngos su gzugs rjes su dpog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that form is inferred from the taste.

original: 'on kyang ro'i rgyu kho na gzugs kyi lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu nus pa thogs pa med pa nyid rjes su dpog par byed pa de de'i phyir 'bras bu las rgyu rjes su dpog pas 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'du'o zhes bshad pa yin no //üîΩdu bas bud shing 'gyur ba bzhin //
analyzed: 'on kyang ro'i rgyu kho na gzugs kyi lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu nus pa thogs pa med pa nyid rjes su dpog par byed pa de de'i phyir 'bras bu las rgyu rjes su dpog pas 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'du'o zhes bshad pa yin no // du bas bud shing 'gyur ba bzhin //
translated: But the potency of the cause of the taste, which is the cause of the form, is inferred as being unobstructed. Therefore, since the cause is inferred from the effect, it is included in the reason based on effect.üîΩLike the transformation of fuel from smoke.

original: zhes bya ba ni du ba las bud @21b shing gi 'gyur ba rjes su dpog pa bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni du ba las bud @21b shing gi 'gyur ba rjes su dpog pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as the transformation of fuel is inferred from smoke.

original: 'di la du ba dang bud shing gi 'gyur ba ni tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa dag yin te /
analyzed: 'di la du ba dang bud shing gi 'gyur ba ni tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa dag yin te /
translated: Here, the smoke and the transformation of fuel are dependent on the same collection,

original: mes bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mes bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are produced by fire.

original: ro de la du bas rang gi rgyu me kho na rjes su dpog par byed pa na /
analyzed: ro de la du bas rang gi rgyu me kho na rjes su dpog par byed pa na /
translated: When the taste infers the fire, which is its own cause,

original: bud shing gi 'gyur ba skyed par nus pa rjes su dpog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: bud shing gi 'gyur ba skyed par nus pa rjes su dpog par byed pa yin no //
translated: it infers the potency to produce the transformation of fuel.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'chad par byed de /
translated: The verse beginning with ‚Äúthere‚Äù explains this.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni ro las gzugs rtogs pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni ro las gzugs rtogs pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThere‚Äù refers to the understanding of form from taste.

original: rgyu de lta bu kho na zhes bya ba ni ro'i rgyu gzugs kyi lhan cig byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu de lta bu kho na zhes bya ba ni ro'i rgyu gzugs kyi lhan cig byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúJust that cause‚Äù is the cause of taste, which is the co-originating cause of form.

original: 'di ltar gang la nus pa zhugs shing thogs pa med pa can yod pa de ni nus pa zhugs pa can no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang la nus pa zhugs shing thogs pa med pa can yod pa de ni nus pa zhugs pa can no //
translated: Thus, that which has an engaged capacity and is unobstructed is one that has an engaged capacity.

original: de ni de lta bu yang yin la gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu yang yin pas de skad ces bya ste ro de'i rgyu ni de'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen yin zhing /
analyzed: de ni de lta bu yang yin la gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu yang yin pas de skad ces bya ste ro de'i rgyu ni de'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen yin zhing /
translated: That is just that, and it is also the cause of the appropriation of form. It is called that because the cause of that taste is its co-originating condition.

original: ro skyed par byed do //
analyzed: ro skyed par byed do //
translated: It generates taste.

original: rgyu de lta bu rjes su dpag pa na shugs kyis gzugs kyang rjes su dpag pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyu de lta bu rjes su dpag pa na shugs kyis gzugs kyang rjes su dpag pa yin te /
translated: When that kind of cause is inferred, form is also inferred by implication.

original: gzugs dang ro dag ni tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs dang ro dag ni tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because form and taste are dependent on the same collection.

original: bud shing 'gyur ba ni tsha ba'o //
analyzed: bud shing 'gyur ba ni tsha ba'o //
translated: The transformation of fuel is heat.

original: de'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu ni shing ngo //
analyzed: de'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu ni shing ngo //
translated: Its cause of appropriation is wood.

original: de'i lhan cig byed pa de'i rkyen ni me ste de kho na du ba bskyed pa dang 'dra zhing de dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de'i lhan cig byed pa de'i rkyen ni me ste de kho na du ba bskyed pa dang 'dra zhing de dang mtshungs so //
translated: Its co-operating condition is fire, just as that alone produces smoke and is similar to that.

original: gzugs dang ro dag kyang tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid kho na yin no /üîΩ// / bam po gsum pa /
analyzed: gzugs dang ro dag kyang tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid kho na yin no / // / bam po gsum pa /
translated: Form and taste also depend on the same collection.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhung 'dzugs par byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhung 'dzugs par byed do //
translated: Thus, etc. establishes the text.

original: nus pa'i 'dzugs pa zhes bya ba ni mdo yin no //
analyzed: nus pa'i 'dzugs pa zhes bya ba ni mdo yin no //
translated: The establishment of the capacity is the sutra.

original: 'di'i rnam par bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di'i rnam par bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of this is:

original: rang gi rgyu zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: own cause, etc.

original: rang gi rgyu zhes bya ba ni ro'i'o //
analyzed: rang gi rgyu zhes bya ba ni ro'i'o //
translated: Own cause is of taste.

original: 'bras bu bskyed par bya ba la zhes bya ba ni ro bskyed par bya ba la'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu bskyed par bya ba la zhes bya ba ni ro bskyed par bya ba la'o //
translated: In the production of the effect is in the production of taste.

original: mngon du phyogs shing bar du ma chod pa med pa ni ro med do //
analyzed: mngon du phyogs shing bar du ma chod pa med pa ni ro med do //
translated: Not obstructed, facing is not without taste.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni nus pa 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni nus pa 'jug pa'o //
translated: That itself is the engagement of the capacity.

original: gzhan gyi rgyu zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par bshad pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi rgyu zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par bshad pa ni /
translated: Other cause is the explanation of this.

original: gzugs kyi nye bar len pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi nye bar len pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Form is the appropriator of the self.üîΩ

original: gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu gzugs kyi rdul phra rab skad cig ma snga mas bsdus pa gang dag yin pa de dag gzugs bskyed par bya ba la mngon du 'jug pa de'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu gzugs kyi rdul phra rab skad cig ma snga mas bsdus pa gang dag yin pa de dag gzugs bskyed par bya ba la mngon du 'jug pa de'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The cause of the form that is the cause of the appropriation of form is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated.

original: gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu ni ro'i rgyu lhan cig byed pa kho nas rang gi 'bras bu bskyed pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu ni ro'i rgyu lhan cig byed pa kho nas rang gi 'bras bu bskyed pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The cause of the appropriation of form is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated, because it is the cause of the generation of its own effect, the form that is to be generated, by the cause of the appropriation of form.

original: @22a * // ro'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu 'jug pa de yang gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu gzugs bskyed par bya ba la 'jug pa gang yin pa ste /üîΩro'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu 'jug pa gang la de dang lhan cig byed pa'i ngang tshul yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: @22a * // ro'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu 'jug pa de yang gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu gzugs bskyed par bya ba la 'jug pa gang yin pa ste /üîΩro'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu 'jug pa gang la de dang lhan cig byed pa'i ngang tshul yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The cause of the manifestation of the cause of the appropriation of form is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated.üîΩThe cause of the manifestation of the cause of the appropriation of form is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated, because it is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated by the cause of the appropriation of form.üîΩThe cause of the manifestation of the cause of the appropriation of form is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated, because it is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated by the cause of the appropriation of form.üîΩThe cause of the manifestation of the cause of the appropriation of form is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated, because it is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated by the cause of the appropriation of form.üîΩThe cause of the manifestation of the cause of the appropriation of form is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated, because it is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated by the cause of the appropriation of form.üîΩThe cause of the manifestation of the cause of the appropriation of form is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated, because it is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated by the cause of the appropriation of form.üîΩThe cause of the manifestation of the cause of the appropriation of form is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated, because it is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated by the cause of the appropriation of form.üîΩThe cause of the manifestation of the cause of the appropriation of form is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated, because it is the cause of the manifestation of the form that is to be generated by the cause of the appropriation of form.üîΩThe cause of the manifestation of the cause of the appropriation of form is the cause of the manifestation of the form

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir rgyu ji lta bu las zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu nus pa zhugs pa can dang / lhan cig pa'i ro skad cig ma snga mas bsdus pa las rtags nyid du mngon par 'dod pa 'byung ba'i ros /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir rgyu ji lta bu las zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu nus pa zhugs pa can dang / lhan cig pa'i ro skad cig ma snga mas bsdus pa las rtags nyid du mngon par 'dod pa 'byung ba'i ros /
translated: Because that is so, the reason why the result is the sign of the cause is that the result is the sign of the cause that produces it.üîΩThe reason why the result is the sign of the cause is that the result is the sign of the cause that produces it.üîΩThe reason why the result is the sign of the cause is that the result is the sign of the cause that produces it.

original: 'bras bu'i rtags nyid kyis rang gi rgyu de lta bu ste /üîΩgzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu ji skad bshad pa dang lhan cig pa rjes su dpog par byed pa na /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rtags nyid kyis rang gi rgyu de lta bu ste / gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu ji skad bshad pa dang lhan cig pa rjes su dpog par byed pa na /
translated: The reason why the result is the sign of the cause is that the result is the sign of the cause that produces it.üîΩThe reason why the result is the sign of the cause is that the result is the sign of the cause that produces it.üîΩThe reason why the result is the sign of the cause is that the result is the sign of the cause that produces it.

original: rgyu'i chos rjes su dpog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi shugs kyis rang dang dus mnyam pa'i gzugs rjes su dpog par byed cing rtogs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyu'i chos rjes su dpog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi shugs kyis rang dang dus mnyam pa'i gzugs rjes su dpog par byed cing rtogs par byed pa yin te /
translated: The reason why the result is the sign of the cause is that the result is the sign of the cause that produces it.

original: ji ltar ro'i nye bar len pas ro bskyed pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi nye bar len pas kyang ro dang dus mnyam du 'byung ba'i gzugs bskyed pas na /
analyzed: ji ltar ro'i nye bar len pas ro bskyed pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi nye bar len pas kyang ro dang dus mnyam du 'byung ba'i gzugs bskyed pas na /
translated: The reason why the result is the sign of the cause is that the result is the sign of the cause that produces it.üîΩThe reason why the result is the sign of the cause is that the result is the sign of the cause that produces it.

original: rang gi nye bar len pa'i rgyu gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu nus pa zhugs pa can dang lhan cig pa nyid du rjes su dpag pa'i phyir dngos su rtags nyid yin pas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi nye bar len pa'i rgyu gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu nus pa zhugs pa can dang lhan cig pa nyid du rjes su dpag pa'i phyir dngos su rtags nyid yin pas ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not a direct reason because it is inferred to be simultaneous with the form that is its substantial cause and possesses the engaged potentiality.üîΩ

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not a direct reason because it is not related to the object to be established.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /üîΩde ltar 'das dus gcig rnams rtogs //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / de ltar 'das dus gcig rnams rtogs //
translated: For that reason,üîΩit is said, ‚ÄúIn that way, one understands those of the past.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba 'das pa'i dus ni ro'i nye bar len pa dang dus mnyam du byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'das pa'i dus ni ro'i nye bar len pa dang dus mnyam du byung ba rnams so //
translated: The past is the arising of the object to be established simultaneously with the object to be established.

original: dus gcig pa ni rtags su gyur pa'i ro dang lhan cig 'byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: dus gcig pa ni rtags su gyur pa'i ro dang lhan cig 'byung ba rnams so //
translated: Those of the same time are those that arise simultaneously with the object to be established that is the reason.

original: de dag rtogs kyi ma 'ongs pa rnams ni ma yin te 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag rtogs kyi ma 'ongs pa rnams ni ma yin te 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Those are understood, but not those of the future because they are mistaken.

original: gang zhig 'khrul zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig 'khrul zhe na /
translated: What is mistaken?

original: 'gal ba'i rkyen nye bas rgyun 'chad kyang srid pa'i phyir ro'i nye bar len pa ma 'ongs pa kho na yin gyi gzugs dang ro'i rgyu dag phan tshun lhan cig byed pa nyid du 'khrul pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i rkyen nye bas rgyun 'chad kyang srid pa'i phyir ro'i nye bar len pa ma 'ongs pa kho na yin gyi gzugs dang ro'i rgyu dag phan tshun lhan cig byed pa nyid du 'khrul pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The future primary elements are the cause of the primary elements and of the derivative material elements, but the reverse is not true.

original: gal te yin na ni 'das pa'i dus dang dus gcig pa dag la yang ji ltar rjes su dpag par 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te yin na ni 'das pa'i dus dang dus gcig pa dag la yang ji ltar rjes su dpag par 'gyur /
translated: If it were otherwise, how could one infer the existence of the primary elements of the past from the existence of the derivative material elements of the present?

original: de lta bas na ngo'i sgo nas gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa 'di yang 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na ngo'i sgo nas gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa 'di yang 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa yin no //
translated: Thus the knowledge of the primary elements, of the derivative material elements, is produced by an effect-evidence.

original: 'das pa'i dus rnams kyis ni 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa yin la rag na dus gcig pa rnams kyi go ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'das pa'i dus rnams kyis ni 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa yin la rag na dus gcig pa rnams kyi go ji ltar zhe na /
translated: But if the past primary elements are known by an effect-evidence, how can one infer their existence?

original: 'di ni nyes pa med do //
analyzed: 'di ni nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault.

original: 'di ltar 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa zhes bya ba 'di la don gnyis te re @22b zhig gang gi tshe 'das pa rnams rtogs pa yin pa de'i tshe ni de ni 'bras bu yang yin rtags kyang yin pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa zhes bya ba 'di la don gnyis te re @22b zhig gang gi tshe 'das pa rnams rtogs pa yin pa de'i tshe ni de ni 'bras bu yang yin rtags kyang yin pas /
translated: Thus, the phrase ‚Äúarisen from a cause‚Äù has two meanings: when it is the past that is understood, then it is the effect that is the evidence, and it is from that that the cause is inferred.

original: 'bras bu'i rtags te de las skyes pa zhes bya ba yin no //üîΩgang gi tshe dus mnyam pa rnams rtogs pa yin pa de'i tshe ni rgyu rjes su dpog pa gang la 'bras bu'i rtags yod pa'i 'bras bu'i rtags yin la de las skyes pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rtags te de las skyes pa zhes bya ba yin no // gang gi tshe dus mnyam pa rnams rtogs pa yin pa de'i tshe ni rgyu rjes su dpog pa gang la 'bras bu'i rtags yod pa'i 'bras bu'i rtags yin la de las skyes pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is the effect that is the evidence, and it is from that that it arises.üîΩWhen it is the present that is understood, then it is the cause that is inferred, and it is the effect that is the evidence, and it is from that that it arises.

original: de'i sgo nas 'ong ba zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i sgo nas 'ong ba zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the effect that is the evidence, and it is from that that it comes.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum las go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum las go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan ni med do //
translated: For that reason, there is no other type of evidence than the three types of evidence.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba dag gi rtags can dang / rang bzhin ma 'brel pa ni med na mi 'byung bar nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba dag gi rtags can dang / rang bzhin ma 'brel pa ni med na mi 'byung bar nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no evidence that is neither the essence nor the effect of the object to be established, and because there is no evidence that is not ascertained to be invariably concomitant with the object to be established.

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni ro las gzugs rjes su dpag pa bshad pas so //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni ro las gzugs rjes su dpag pa bshad pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù refers to the explanation of the inference of form from taste.

original: grog ma 'pho ba ni de dag sgo nga khyer nas gzhan du 'pho ba'o //
analyzed: grog ma 'pho ba ni de dag sgo nga khyer nas gzhan du 'pho ba'o //
translated: The ‚Äúmigration of ants‚Äù is the carrying off of their eggs by ants.

original: nya 'phar ba ni nya rnams gyin du mchong ba'o //
analyzed: nya 'phar ba ni nya rnams gyin du mchong ba'o //
translated: The ‚Äúleaping of fish‚Äù is the jumping of fish.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni glog 'gyu ba dang sbal ba skad 'byin pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni glog 'gyu ba dang sbal ba skad 'byin pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the flashing of lightning, the croaking of frogs, and so on.

original: char pa la sogs pa rjes su dpog pa zhes bya ba 'dir yang sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras rlung la sogs pa bsdu ste /
analyzed: char pa la sogs pa rjes su dpog pa zhes bya ba 'dir yang sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras rlung la sogs pa bsdu ste /
translated: The ‚Äúinference of rain, etc.‚Äù includes wind, etc.

original: ji ltar de dang rgyu'i chos rjes su dpog pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar de dang rgyu'i chos rjes su dpog pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Just as the cause is inferred from the effect, so the effect is inferred from the cause.

original: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la skyes pa yin pa ltar bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la skyes pa yin pa ltar bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of the inference of the cause from the effect.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir de la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir de la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate just this, he says, ‚ÄúIn that case, etc.‚Äù

original: grog ma 'pho ba la sogs pa de la yang ngo //
analyzed: grog ma 'pho ba la sogs pa de la yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case‚Äù refers to the migration of ants, etc.

original: char pa'i rgyu 'byung ba 'gyur ba kho na zhes bya ba ni kho na zhes bya ba 'byung ba 'gyur ba char pa'i rgyu kho na grog ma la sogs pa 'khrugs pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩ'pho ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu yin no zhes rim pa bzhin du sbyar ba yin no //
analyzed: char pa'i rgyu 'byung ba 'gyur ba kho na zhes bya ba ni kho na zhes bya ba 'byung ba 'gyur ba char pa'i rgyu kho na grog ma la sogs pa 'khrugs pa la sogs pa ste / 'pho ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu yin no zhes rim pa bzhin du sbyar ba yin no //
translated: The cause of rain is only the transformation of the elements.üîΩThe only cause of rain is the transformation of the elements, which is the cause of the agitation of ants, etc.üîΩThe cause of the agitation of ants, etc. is the transformation of the elements, which is the cause of the agitation of ants, etc.

original: de lta bas na char pa'i rgyu 'byung ba gyur pa ji lta bu las grog ma la sogs pa 'khrugs par gyur pa'i rgyu de lta bu rjes su dpag pas char pa rjes su dpag pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na char pa'i rgyu 'byung ba gyur pa ji lta bu las grog ma la sogs pa 'khrugs par gyur pa'i rgyu de lta bu rjes su dpag pas char pa rjes su dpag pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the cause of rain is the transformation of the elements, and from that cause, the agitation of ants, etc. is inferred.

original: 'di la ni rung ba nyid rjes su dpog par byed kyi char pa kho na ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la ni rung ba nyid rjes su dpog par byed kyi char pa kho na ni ma yin te /
translated: In this case, the suitability of rain is inferred, not rain itself,

original: gags byed pa srid pas 'khrugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gags byed pa srid pas 'khrugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because agitation is possible due to obstruction.

original: de lta bas na rgyu tshogs pa las kyang 'bras bu rjes su dpag pa med kyi rung ba nyid 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: de lta bas na rgyu tshogs pa las kyang 'bras bu rjes su dpag pa med kyi rung ba nyid 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: Thus, the effect is not inferred from the assemblage of causes, but only the suitability.

original: dpyod pa can la sogs pa gang dag rgyu ma tshogs pa las kyang 'bras bu rjes su dpog par byed pa de dag rigs pa las shin tu phyi rol du @23a * //
analyzed: dpyod pa can la sogs pa gang dag rgyu ma tshogs pa las kyang 'bras bu rjes su dpog par byed pa de dag rigs pa las shin tu phyi rol du @23a * //
translated: Those who infer effects from incomplete causes are even further removed from reason.

original: gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba de bstan pa'i phyir rgyu ma tshogs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩma tshogs pa ni mtshang ba'o //
analyzed: gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba de bstan pa'i phyir rgyu ma tshogs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / ma tshogs pa ni mtshang ba'o //
translated: To demonstrate this, he says, ‚ÄúIf an effect is inferred from an incomplete cause-set, etc.‚ÄùüîΩAn incomplete cause-set is a deficient cause-set.

original: rjes su dpag pa lhag ma dang ldan pa ni ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa lhag ma dang ldan pa ni ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The remaining inferences are inconclusive.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not capable of producing the effect.

original: 'di'i rnam par bshad ba ni rung ba nyid kyang rgyu tshogs pa dag kho nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i rnam par bshad ba ni rung ba nyid kyang rgyu tshogs pa dag kho nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: The explanation of this is as follows: ‚ÄúOnly complete cause-sets are capable of producing effects, etc.‚Äù

original: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'bras bu lta re zhig rnam pa thams cad du rjes su dpog par mi byed kyi rung ba nyid rjes su dpog par byed na yang tshogs pa kho nas rjes su dpog par byed do zhes bya ba de ston to //
analyzed: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'bras bu lta re zhig rnam pa thams cad du rjes su dpog par mi byed kyi rung ba nyid rjes su dpog par byed na yang tshogs pa kho nas rjes su dpog par byed do zhes bya ba de ston to //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates that even though the effect is not inferred in all ways, if only a possibility is inferred, it is inferred only from the collection.

original: ma tshogs pa la ni shin tu nus pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma phyi ma phyi ma yongs su gyur pas kyang mi nus pa'i phyir ro //üîΩlus la 'dod chags rjes dpog bzhin //
analyzed: ma tshogs pa la ni shin tu nus pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma phyi ma phyi ma yongs su gyur pas kyang mi nus pa'i phyir ro // lus la 'dod chags rjes dpog bzhin //
translated: Because the collection is not capable of producing the effect, the collection is not the cause.

original: zhes bya ba ni dper brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dper brjod pa yin no //
translated: The example is like the inference of attachment to the body.

original: 'di'i rnam par bshad pa ni dper na lus dang dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i rnam par bshad pa ni dper na lus dang dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: The explanation of this is like the passage beginning ‚ÄúThe body, the senses, etc.‚Äù

original: lus dang dbang po rnams dang blo zhes zlas dbye ba yin no //
analyzed: lus dang dbang po rnams dang blo zhes zlas dbye ba yin no //
translated: The compound ‚Äúbody, senses, and mind‚Äù is a dvandva compound.

original: skyes bu 'di ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin te lus dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bu 'di ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin te lus dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This person is attached, etc., because he has a body.

original: dbang po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is attached, etc., because he has senses.

original: blo dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ltar lus la sogs pa las 'dod chags la sogs pa rjes su dpog par byed pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ltar lus la sogs pa las 'dod chags la sogs pa rjes su dpog par byed pa lta bu'o //
translated: because it is endowed with intelligence.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa bsdu ste /
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa bsdu ste /
translated: The words ‚Äúand so on‚Äù include hatred, delusion, etc.

original: mdo las lus dang 'dod chags smos pa ni nye bar mtshon par zad do //
analyzed: mdo las lus dang 'dod chags smos pa ni nye bar mtshon par zad do //
translated: The s≈´tra mentions only attachment to the body, but this is only an illustration.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgyu ni dbang po la sogs pa kho na ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgyu ni dbang po la sogs pa kho na ma yin no //
translated: The causes of attachment, etc., are not just the faculties, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin no //üîΩ'dod chags la sogs pa gang dag la sngon du 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin no // 'dod chags la sogs pa gang dag la sngon du 'gro ba ste /
translated: Because attachment, etc., are preceded by the adherence to ‚ÄúI‚Äù and ‚Äúmine.‚Äù

original: rgyu bdag dang bdag gi la nga'o nga'i'o snyam du mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa de yod pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu bdag dang bdag gi la nga'o nga'i'o snyam du mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa de yod pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Those attachments, etc., that are preceded by the adherence to ‚ÄúI‚Äù and ‚Äúmine‚Äù are said to exist where there is the cause of attachment, etc.üîΩThe cause of attachment, etc., is the adherence to ‚ÄúI‚Äù and ‚Äúmine.‚Äù

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad skye ba'i sngon du 'gro ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa yin te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad skye ba'i sngon du 'gro ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa yin te /
translated: The non-proper is the antecedent of the arising of all defilements.

original: tshul bzhin ni dngos po rnams kyi mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: tshul bzhin ni dngos po rnams kyi mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The non-proper is impermanence, suffering, and selflessness, etc. of things,

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba dang mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba dang mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is in conformity with the arising of right view.

original: de dag la 'dzin cing dmigs pa ni tshul bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de dag la 'dzin cing dmigs pa ni tshul bzhin du'o //
translated: The proper is the apprehension and the objective support of those.

original: de ni de @23b lta bu yang yin la yid la byed pa yang yin pas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ste /
analyzed: de ni de @23b lta bu yang yin la yid la byed pa yang yin pas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ste /
translated: That is the proper mental attention because it is both that and mental attention.

original: bdag med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: bdag med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: It is the intuition of selflessness.

original: de dang 'gal ba bdag la sogs par shas pa ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ste /
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba bdag la sogs par shas pa ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ste /
translated: The non-proper mental attention is the apprehension of self, etc., which is contrary to that,

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyes pa thams cad skye ba'i sngon du 'gro ba ni de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyes pa thams cad skye ba'i sngon du 'gro ba ni de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the antecedent of the arising of all faults such as passion, etc.

original: lus dang dbang po dang blo dag kyang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgyu ma yin nam /
analyzed: lus dang dbang po dang blo dag kyang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgyu ma yin nam /
translated: And are not the body, faculties, and mind the cause of attachment, etc.?

original: de dag med pa la ni 'dod chags pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de dag med pa la ni 'dod chags pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: For one who is without them, attachment is not seen.

original: lus la sogs pa rgyu nyid yin mod kyi zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: lus la sogs pa rgyu nyid yin mod kyi zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúGranted that the body, etc., are the cause . . .‚Äù

original: 'ba' zhig pa rnams la zhes bya ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams la'o //üîΩ'dod chags la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba la mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni 'dod chags la sogs pa med pa rdo ba'i dum bu la sogs pa ste /üîΩde dag la gtan tshigs lus la sogs pa dang ldan pa 'jug pa gang yin pa de du ma mthong du zin kyang bzlog na gnod ba can gyi tshad ma med pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa 'di lhag ma dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig pa rnams la zhes bya ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams la'o // 'dod chags la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba la mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni 'dod chags la sogs pa med pa rdo ba'i dum bu la sogs pa ste / de dag la gtan tshigs lus la sogs pa dang ldan pa 'jug pa gang yin pa de du ma mthong du zin kyang bzlog na gnod ba can gyi tshad ma med pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa 'di lhag ma dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúby themselves‚Äù means that they are divorced from improper mental activity.üîΩThe absence of attachment, etc., is the opposite of the cause of attachment, etc. It is like a piece of stone, etc.,

original: de'i phyir the tshom du 'gyur gyi nges pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir the tshom du 'gyur gyi nges pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Although the presence of a body, etc., is seen in many cases where attachment, etc., are produced, when it is absent, the presence of attachment, etc., is not seen. Therefore, although the presence of a body, etc., is seen in many cases where attachment, etc., are produced, when it is absent, the presence of attachment, etc., is not seen.
